titleStmt.title: A collection of curious pictures, viz. paintings and limnings, by the best masters. Will be sold by auction on Thursday the 15th, and Friday and Saturday, the 16th and 17th of this instant January, 1691. at the Barbadoes Coffe-House in Exchange-Alley, over against the Royal-Exchange, in Cornhil. The sale beginning precisely at four of the clock every afternoon. By Edward Millington. Catalogues of which are distributed by Mr. Gilliflower in Westminster-Hall: Mr. Nott in the Pall Mall: Mr. Bently in Russel-street, Covent-Garden: Mr. Wilkinon [sic] in Fleet-street: Mr. Hargrave, at the KingsHead, over against Furnivals-Inn in Holborn: Mr; [sic] Miller, at the Acorn, in St. Paul's Church yard: and Mr. Crouch over against the Royal-Exchange, in Cornhil, booksellers
titleStmt.author: Millington, Edward, d. 1703.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
